issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBO 1.49.3rc6

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly, Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.mtvuutiset.fi/artikkeli/salossa-etsitaan-kadonnutta-vanhusta/8242082#gs.z9vb5z

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Cookies for social media will have to accepted, otherwise embedded content won't work. This rule causes the issue: `||cookielaw.org^$third-party`. The GDPR script will have to whitelisted for this site, or a cookie should be created that sets social media cookies as accepted.

(Personally I think that blocking `cookielaw.org` generically might not be a good idea as it will cause breakages on many pages. Specific rule is safer.)

Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

Social media cookies not accepted:

![kuva](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/17256841/e7c01774-42e6-44fd-a578-2353a56c46c8)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

Social media cookies are accepted:

![kuva](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/17256841/70a372e8-cfb7-46ea-b17e-9e9861f37229)

</details>
